bug.author: adrianeboyd
bug.summary: Tokenizer default URL pattern may be slow
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
Tokenizer may be extremely slow due to positive lookbehind. See example in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/issues/4362>#4362</denchmark-link> . Tokenizer performance could be improved by including with multiple token_match options, one with the highest priority and one that allows prefixes and suffixes.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
